subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney and Cristiano Ronaldo scored late goals for Manchester United, which beat Reading, 2-0, to remain in first place in England’s Premier League. At Newcastle, fans welcomed back Kevin Keegan as Newcastle United’s coach after an 11-year absence, but his team struggled in a 0-0 tie with Bolton.
